alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Northern High Plains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:13PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Pondera, southern Liberty, southeastern Glacier, southern Toole, eastern Teton and northwestern Chouteau Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 813 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Cut Bank to 17 miles southeast of Shelby to 16 miles southeast of The Knees. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Cut Bank, Conrad, Valier, Lothair, The Knees, Ethridge, Ledger, Tiber Dam, Galata, Santa Rita, Devon, and Dunkirk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Northern High Plains; Western and Central Chouteau County
